content.text: 求数组最大值。Finds the maximum value in an array of numbers. This is an alias for the arrayMax function from the utils package.
最大值。The largest number in the array
Throws an error if the array is empty or contains non-numeric values
- For finding both min and max in one operation

summary.text: 数值列表。Array of numbers to find the maximum value from (must not be empty)

text.comment: 数值列表。Array of numbers to find the maximum value from (must not be empty)

Function:

max

Description:

求数组最大值。Finds the maximum value in an array of numbers. This is an alias for the arrayMax function from the utils package.

Returns:

最大值。The largest number in the array

Throws:

Throws an error if the array is empty or contains non-numeric values

Example:
// Basic maximum finding
const values = [10, 5, 8, 3, 12];
const maxValue = max(values); // Returns 12
Example:
// Finding maximum in chart data
const chartData = [25, 40, 15, 60, 30];
const maxDataPoint = max(chartData); // Returns 60
// Use for setting chart Y-axis maximum
Since:

1.0.0

See:
  • min - For finding minimum values
  • getListExtremum - For finding both min and max in one operation
